General.Name: Noodles & Company
General.Description: Noodles & Company, a restaurant concept company, develops and operates fast-casual restaurants. It offers cooked-to-order dishes, including noodles and pasta, soups, salads, and appetizers. It operates company owned locations and franchise locations. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Broomfield, Colorado.
General.Address: 520 Zang Street, Broomfield, CO, United States, 80021
